## Loading the data

```{r, include=FALSE}
load("house_elections.rda")
load("candidates.rda")
load("committees.rda")
load("contributions.rda")
```

## Loading packages 

```{r, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
#Merge candidates and contributions 
cand_cont <- candidates %>%
  inner_join(contributions, by = "cand_id")

#Merge house_elections and my_candidates
mutate(house_elections, )

my_candidates <- cand_cont %>%
  inner_join(house_elections, by = )
```
